item.title: Using s3cmd to sync and invalidate cloudfront content on AWS
item.description: How to use s3cmd to upload static content (in this case, generated with pelican) and have s3cmd do the heavy lifting with also invalidating CloudFront paths for you.
item.dc:creator: Mike
